location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 16: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of a number of William Newnham's letters (nos. 1377, 1385, 1389, 1425, 1430, 1442 and 1443 of 1823, and no. 14 of 1824).
